snippet: Sinking in the polls a month before Costa Rica’s presidential election, Johnny Araya, the candidate for the country’s governing party, pulled out of the campaign on Wednesday.
abstract: Johnny Araya, presidential candidate for Costa Rica's governing party, pulls out of the campaign, effectively conceding election to Luis Guillermo Solis.
lead_paragraph: Sinking in the polls a month before Costa Rica’s presidential election, Johnny Araya, the candidate for the country’s governing party, pulled out of the campaign on Wednesday.

headline.main: Governing Party Candidate Pulls Out of Costa Rica’s Presidential Campaign
headline.print_headline: Costa Rica: Governing Party Candidate Pulls Out of Campaign for President
